Property.name: TextGapTop
Property.summary: Gets the extra space on the top side when drawing the caption text.
Property.value: The extra space, in pixel, on the top side when drawing the caption text.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: TextGapBottom
Property.summary: Gets the extra space on the bottom side when drawing the caption text.
Property.value: The extra space, in pixel, on the bottom side when drawing the caption text.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: TextGapLeft
Property.summary: Gets the extra space on the left side when drawing the caption text.
Property.value: The extra space, in pixel, on the left side when drawing the caption text.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: TextGapRight
Property.summary: Gets the extra space on the right side when drawing the caption text.
Property.value: The extra space, in pixel, on the right side when drawing the caption text.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: ButtonGapTop
Property.summary: Gets the space between the inert buttons and the top of the caption area.
Property.value: The the space, in pixel, between the inert buttons and the top of the caption area.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.value: The the space, in pixel, between the inert buttons and the bottom of the caption area.

Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: ButtonGapLeft
Property.summary: Gets the space between the inert buttons and the left caption text.
Property.value: The the space, in pixel, between the inert buttons and the left caption text.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: ButtonGapBetween
Property.summary: Gets the space between the inert buttons.
Property.value: The the space, in pixel, between the inert buttons.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.
